Welcome.Subject: Hark! Welcome unto Wyvern, {{username}}!
Welcome.Title: Welcome, good {{username}}!
Welcome.Body: We are most joyous that thou hast joined the house of Wyvern. Let us prepare thee straightway!
Welcome.ActionPrompt: To embark upon thy quest, prithee verify thine account:
Welcome.LinkExpiry: This token of verification shall endure but thirty minutes.
Welcome.Support: Dost thou require aid? Reach us at support@wyvern.gg, or seek fellowship in Wyvern’s noble company.
Welcome.SignOff:
With cheer and goodwill,
— The Fellowship of Wyvern

Username.Taken: Alas, that name is already claimed.
Username.Empty: A name thou must provide; it cannot be void.
Username.TooShort: Thy chosen name must be no shorter than two characters.
Username.TooLong: Thy chosen name may be no longer than fifteen characters.
Username.InvalidCharacters: Thy name may hold but letters, numbers, dots, or underscores.
Username.RepeatedSymbols: Consecutive dots or underscores may not dwell within thy name.
Username.ContainsWyvern: The word ‘wyvern’ may not be borne within thy name.
Username.BlockedPhrase: Thy name concealeth a forbidden phrase.

Password.Empty: Thy secret word may not be naught.
Password.TooShort: Thy secret word must be eight characters at the least.
Password.TooLong: Thy secret word must not exceed fourscore and four characters.
Password.MissingUpper: Thy secret word must contain at least one capital letter.
Password.MissingLower: Thy secret word must contain at least one humble letter.
Password.MissingDigit: Thy secret word must contain at least one numeral.
Password.MissingSpecial: Thy secret word must contain at least one special character.

Email.Taken: That letter of correspondence is already in use. Choose thee another.
Email.Empty: Thou must provide an email; it cannot be void.
Email.TooLong: Thy email may not exceed three hundred and twenty characters.
Email.InvalidFormat: The form of thy email is improper.
Email.InvalidSymbol: Thy email must contain but a single ‘@’.
Email.UnresolvableDomain: The domain '{domain}' appeareth false. Try another, or summon support shouldst thou be certain.

Age.InvalidBirthday: Thy day of birth cannot lie in time’s unwritten morrow.
Age.TooYoung: Thou must have seen at least thirteen summers to partake of this service.
Age.Suspicious: Art thou truly {age} years of age? If so, seek support — and we shall buy thee cake!

Register.VerifyEmailRequired: Thou art near the end! Look within thy inbox and verify thy email to finish thy joining.
Register.UsernameReserved: This name is reserved by decree.
Register.InvalidInvite: The token of invitation thou gavest is false.
Register.InviteOnly: Enrollment is by invitation only. Present a true code, or wait upon fortune’s grace.
